- Scientific disciplines can be decomposed into latent topics
- Compositional approach to topic modeling enables geometric analysis
- Science is split by Culture--Nature, Life--Non-life, and Materials--Methods dichotomies
- Topic portfolios of researchers can be mapped relationally in knowledge space
- Epistemological position-takings reveal social patterns among knowledge producers
